CodecDevice::VideoDecoderInfo

CodecDevice::VideoDecoderInfo Struct Reference

#include <Apoxi/AddOns/CodecManager/CodecDevice.hpp>


Data Fields

BOOLEAN m_clock_support

Detailed Description

Struct containing informations delivered by the video decoder.

Field Documentation

BOOLEAN CodecDevice::VideoDecoderInfo::m_clock_support
 

Indicates if the video decoder supports a clock (e.g. an external clock on companion chip).

LocationType CodecDevice::VideoDecoderInfo::m_location
 

Location of the video decoder.
